title: change language in game
body: Can I use the change language in game software when I play game ? does it safe? I want to hear another language voice but don't want to change writing language.

replies.body: Each region have their own list of supported languages, and can be selected when changing regions via the patcher.  Currently, North America only supports English and cannot exceed that.  More information on our list of supported languages can be found through the [language guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language).  Hope that helps clear things up!
